function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate air disinfection strategies leading to increased risk of airborne disease iaq due to inefficient ventilation leading to increased spread of infection","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air quality exacerbating the spread of airborne viruses","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Indoor environment quality mediating the impact of the built environment on residents’ health.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Densely populated environments increase exposure to pathogens","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Indoor airborne transmission.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reluctance to use elevators in high-rise buildings due to disease transmission environment","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The need for transformative changes in physical spaces to mitigate future virus associated with nanomaterials and nanotechnology","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Modular construction strategy increasing the spread of covid-19 infection due to the movement and assembly of prefabricated components from different locations.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adaptive reuse strategy leading to the potential exposure of workers and healthcare professionals to contaminated materials or surfaces from the existing structures being converted.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of increased contagion in multi-story buildings due to high contact surfaces like elevator buttons and door handles","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of poor indoor air quality leading to sick-building syndrome","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of overwhelmed healthcare systems and inadequate medical injuries.","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High population density increases the risk of contagious diseases spread in cities","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased density in offices due to altered office spaces and remote working
